/* GradeDAO.selectGradeList */ SELECT A.* ,fn_ct_get_code_name('auth_cd', A.AUTH_CD) AS AUTH_CD_VIEW ,A.AGENCY_CD AS AGENCY_CD_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('appor_status', A.APPOR_STATUS) AS APPOR_STATUS_VIEW ,fn_ct_get_code_name('class_id', A.CLASS_ID) AS CLASS_ID_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.CONN_ALLOWED_START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_TIME_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.CONN_ALLOWED_END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS END_TIME_VIEW ,B.EVAL_POINT ,B.CNT FROM TB_WEB_IT_USER A ,(SELECT R.REG_ID ,TO_CHAR(ROUND(AVG(NVL(W.EVAL_POINT,0)),1),'9999.9') AS EVAL_POINT ,COUNT(R.REG_ID) CNT FROM TB_WEB_HT_DOWNLOAD W, TB_WEB_HT_BOARD R WHERE 1=1 AND W.B_SEQ = R.B_SEQ GROUP BY R.REG_ID) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = B.REG_ID(+) AND A.APPOR_STATUS = '101'
A.USER_ID = #sUserId#
A.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#sUserNm#||'%'
A.USE_YN = #sUseYn#
ORDER BY A.USER_NM
sqlMap.update: /* GradeDAO.updateGrade */ UPDATE TB_WEB_IT_USER SET CLASS_ID = #classId# ,USE_YN = #useYn# WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #userId#
